subject: Re: [junit] Parsing Junit test results
msgSnippet: ... several options: 1) generate the xml report with the Ant task use XSLT to parse the report 2) use the JUnit-addons Runner and define a listener that does
messageBody:
> I am looking for ideas or applications that would allow me to parse
> the result. How could this best be done? Any ideas would be
> appreciated since I have never used this before and am looking for
> options to do this prasing.

several options:

1) generate the xml report with the Ant task
use XSLT to parse the report

2) use the JUnit-addons Runner and define a listener that does your
parsing (in fact, you don't have to parse anything since you're
receiving the TestResult object).

the code is under cvs, hosted on sf
<http://sf.net/projects/junit-addons>, there is little documentation
(feel free to enhance it) but it's very flexible.

-Vladimir
